listItems.description: Create a CNAME file with the name of the domain you want to point it at, ie: “elirousso.com” (http:// is not required)
Commit the CNAME file and push up your changes
In your DNS manager, create an A record for the root apex \”@\” and point it to 192.30.252.153
In your DNS manager, create an A record for the root apex \”www\” and point it to 192.30.252.153
Wait for the name servers to update. This could take a little while, so grab a coffee.

title: Setting up Custom Domains for GitHub Project Pages
